channel.title: infra on Karn Wong
channel.description: Recent content in infra on Karn Wong

item.title: Mongodb export woes
item.description: There’s a task where I need to export 4M+ records out of mongodb, total uncompressed size is 17GB+ 26GB export methods mongoexport The recommended way to export is using mongoexport utility, but you have to specify the output attributes, which doesn’t work for me because the schema from older set of records are less than the newer set DIY python script the vanilla way But you can interact with mongodb from python, and if you read from it it’ll return a dict, which is perfect for this because you don’t have to specify the required attributes beforehand.
